page.title: 18A Day in my Life in Thorney
page.content: When break has finished we do other work up to dinner time. We have exactly 75 minutes. We then do work right the way up to{3.30}when school finishes, with a break at{2.08.}At {4.00}I have my tea and then watch T.V. My dad comes home for tea at{4.00,}and then he has to go back to work at {5.00.}At{5.00}I go to the park and meet my friend Sara. I play at the park for about 2 hours. We usually play on the swings, go down the dykes, and play on the wild muddy ground behind the tennis courts. My dad finishes at{8.00,}so I go home. I then have a wash, have supper and go to bed about{9.00.}This is what happens on week days. At the week-end we would go to town or perhaps see our relations.
